question: Choose the correct answer for Type 1 Conditional:

options.A: If you wouldn’t tell me, I’ll scream!
options.B: If you don’t tell me, I’ll scream!
options.C: If you didn’t tell me, I’ll scream!
options.D: If you won’t tell me, I’d scream!

question: Choose the correct answer for Type 1 Conditional:

options.A: I’ll only tell you, if you can keep a secret.
options.B: If you can keep a secret, I would tell you.
options.C: You can’t keep a secret, if I didn’t tell you.
options.D: You wouldn’t keep a secret if I didn’t tell you.

question: Choose the correct answer for Type 2 Conditional:

options.A: I didn’t do that if I were you.
options.B: I wouldn’t do that if I were you.
options.C: I wouldn’t do that if I was you.
options.D: I won’t do that if I was you.

question: Choose the correct option:

question: Choose the correct type of Conditional to complete the sentence: I wish…
